title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For correctly drawing and appropriately labeling the weight of the block

1 point is earned: For correctly drawing and appropriately labeling the normal force

1 point is earned: For no extraneous forces

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
At the top of the track, the net force on the block is the centripetal force

ma = mv2/r = mg + N

The condition for minimum speed is that the normal force is zero. 1 point is earned: For a correct equation that can be solved for the minimum speed

m v min 2 /r=mg v min = rg v min = ( 0.60m )( 9.8m/ s 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGTb GaamODamaaDaaaleaaciGGTbGaaiyAaiaac6gaaeaacaaIYaaaaOGa ai4laiaadkhacqGH9aqpcaWGTbGaam4zaaqaaiaadAhadaWgaaWcba GaciyBaiaacMgacaGGUbaabeaakiabg2da9maakaaabaGaamOCaiaa dEgaaSqabaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiGac2gacaGGPbGaaiOBaa qabaGccqGH9aqpdaGcaaqaamaabmaabaGaaGimaiaac6cacaaI2aGa aGimaiaad2gaaiaawIcacaGLPaaadaqadaqaaiaaiMdacaGGUaGaaG ioaiaad2gacaGGVaGaam4CamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaOGaayjk aiaawMcaaaWcbeaaaaaa@5924@
